message: I propose a 50/50 split. Let's share the money equally.
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I think I deserve more for being the one making the offer this round
I think a 60/40 split would be fairer than the previous offers. I'm willing to give up some of my share to ensure we both benefit.
I'm willing to give you a small consolation prize, but I'm not going to give up much more than that. You should have taken the 700000 earlier!
I believe a 45/55 split is reasonable considering the situation. I hope you're willing to compromise for a fair division.
